title: Photobomb Eraser - Is there an Eraser App that will let me save the edited pic with my google photos
content: I want to erase a photobomb  and save the edited photo IN MY REGULAR PIXEL CAMERA GALLERY and have it back up to GOOGLE PHOTOS.  Markup doesn't have an eraser, and the apps I tried save the photo under the app, not where my regular photos are saved.
